item.title: Web servers and Webhooks: An analogy
item.description: I was recently asked by a non-technical PM what webhooks were and how they relate to web servers. At the time, I explained in vanilla language but on the train ride home it occurred to me that there is a real-life analogy to explain webhooks and web servers. Restaurants & Web servers Web servers are similar to restaurants. Physical address & Web address A restaurant has a physical address, so customers know where to go if they want to dine at a restaurant.
